title: Shrimply Bloody

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: The host draws a shrimp holding a gun and the next player gains 5 **Card Shards** 🔹.

fields.name: - Flipped:
fields.value: ( 🦐 + <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> ): The host draws a sad shrimp and the next 2 players gain 7 **Card Shards** 🔹. You also remove 1 **Happy** 😃 from a person of your choice.

desc:
Post 2419
- This breaks the rule of 🦐 cards not having an effect on the game and for naming conventions.
